item.description:
The October meeting was a great one with 14 members present. The discussion was lively and the thirst for knowledge about Fibromyalgia and how to recover was intense.

At the November meeting I will be talking about Detoxification and Supplementation as it relates directly to Fibromyalgia sufferers.

Come prepared with questions and please think about the healthcare providers that have helped you with this illness. Bring a list with the practitioner's name and phone number and any relevant information you have about them so we can add them to a master list in the next few months.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia November Meetup
